1.title: Impressionism
1.plot: On her first day as Executive Assistant to the Regional Manager of Pyramid Assurety, Charlotte's attempts to start off on the right foot are thwarted when she encounters a nemesis in the form of the office receptionist, Gabe.

2.title: Cubism
2.plot: Charlotte discovers there may be a bright side to being in the insurance game after all. Louise's reaction to a call from Head Office has Charlotte wondering if there is more to her new boss than meets the eye.

3.title: Mannerism
3.plot: Tensions between Charlotte and Gabe boil over; Louise senses that she has an ally in Charlotte.

4.title: Romanticism
4.plot: During an impromptu lunch meeting, Charlotte negotiates for more responsibility and witnesses a strange encounter. On assignment for Pyramid, Charlotte visits the studio of a legendary local artist and makes a promising connection. Louise is terrified when Head Office arranges to visit.

5.title: Surrealism
5.plot: When Accounting visits the office for a big meeting, Louise is in a tizzy. Charlotte comes to the rescue, proving her talents go beyond the artistic. Flying high from her success, Charlotte returns to Marigold's studio for a mentoring session.

6.title: Realism
6.plot: After a devastating encounter with her idol, Charlotte returns to Pyramid demoralized. While Gabe enjoys the schadenfreude, Louise attempts to revive Charlotte's spirit with an unusual pep talk and makes a startling revelation.

imdb.plot outline: Charlotte Chandler is an artist stuck in a corporate cubicle who can't help telling the truth - about everything. Based on the award-winning short film of the same name, Honestly Charlotte: The Series follows Charlotte as she navigates the frustrating necessity of having a day job, working for a shifty but lovable boss, and dealing with her self-appointed nemesis, all while trying to find her way into the professional art world.
imdb.title: Honestly Charlotte: The Series
plot: In a world where artists need day jobs, one woman speaks the truth.

Charlotte Chandler is an artist stuck in a corporate cubicle who can't help telling the truth - about everything. Based on the award-winning short film of the same name, _Honestly Charlotte: The Series_ (qv) follows Charlotte as she navigates the frustrating necessity of having a day job, working for a shifty but lovable boss, and dealing with her self-appointed nemesis, all while trying to find her way into the professional art world.
